example.eg: The professor carried a bundle of papers to his office.
example.egtrans: 教授把一捆试卷拿进了办公室。

example.eg: George put the bundle of firewood in the trunk of his car.
example.egtrans: 乔治把捆好的木柴放进他车子的后备箱里。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打包好的东西, 捆好的东西

example.eg: The steaks were bundled in sheets of brown paper and tied with twine.
example.egtrans: 牛排用牛皮纸包着，外面还系着麻线。

example.eg: The console is sold as a bundle along with three games.
example.egtrans: 该游戏机与其他三款游戏组成一件捆绑出售商品。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 捆绑出售的商品, 打包出售的商品

example.eg: Max made a bundle off that deal!
example.egtrans: 麦克斯从那笔交易中赚了一大笔钱！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一笔巨款, 一大笔钱

example.eg: A bundle of cash bulged in the man's breast pocket.
example.egtrans: 那个人胸前的口袋鼓鼓的，装着一捆钞票。

example.eg: Vascular bundles transport nutrients to parts of a plant.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与未婚夫或未婚妻同床而卧

example.eg: The meeting was over and everyone bundled off to get on with their various tasks.
example.egtrans: 会议结束，每个人都匆匆离去，继续他们各自的任务。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 匆匆离去, 匆忙离去

example.eg: The train pulled up at the platform and all the passengers bundled out.
example.egtrans: 火车在月台边停下，所有乘客都匆忙离开。

example.eg: The room was small and it was a bit of a squash, but everyone bundled in.
example.egtrans: 房间很小，还有点拥挤，但是所有人还是蜂拥而入。

example.eg: If you bundle the toy truck, the metal sign, and the antique lamp, I'll give you $200.
example.egtrans: 如果你把玩具卡车、金属标牌以及古董台灯捆绑在一起销售的话，我就付你200美元。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...捆绑在一起销售, 把...打包销售

example.eg: The man bundled up my fish and chips in newspaper.
example.egtrans: 那个人用报纸将我的炸鱼和薯条包了起来。

example.eg: It is best to bundle up before going out into cold weather.

dsense.name: bundle of joy, little bundle of joy

example.eg: You're a bundle of nerves, calm down!
